entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, a student at Hogwarts. He is described as 'half-scared' of what he might see and tries to imagine how badly wounded someone would have to be to leave stains on the walls.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts, who is quiet and peering behind an armchair. He uses his wand to reveal Horace Slughorn's location.

entities.name: horace slughorn
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts who is revealed to be hiding in the room. He is described as 'enormously fat' and 'bald'.

entities.name: piano
entities.description: A piece of furniture that has been overturned in the room.

relationships.description: Dumbledore uses his wand to reveal Horace Slughorn's location in the room.
